webparts.innerHtml:
Congratulations on joining Nexi - you definitely made the right decision!

 

With Explore Nexi, we would like to give you some more insights about our Group - the Onboarding Process, your future Homespot and our Organization and Business.

data.description: Zeigen Sie eine Sammlung von Links zu Inhalten wie Dokumenten, Bildern, Videos und mehr in einer Vielzahl von Layouts mit Optionen für Symbole, Bilder und Zielgruppenadressierung an.
data.title: Quicklinks

webparts.innerHtml: Onboarding Information

Onboarding our new colleagues is crucial for us in the Nexi Group. Our employees make us who we are - the leading European PayTech!

We want you to have a great start with us and settle in very quickly - not only in the job but also in our company and culture. To ensure that, we have prepared some Onboarding activities: All of you will get a Buddy, you will be invited to an Onboarding Session and you will receive an Induction plan.
Your Onboarding Journey

data.title: Image

webparts.innerHtml: Your Onboarding Buddy

Every one of you will have a Buddy on the site who will help you settle in. The Buddy is your go-to person - next to your Manager.

The Buddy is a colleague in your location out of your team or a familiar team to show you around, introduce you to tools and systems, to the company and our culture.

Maybe you already had contact with your Buddy - but you will definitely meet you Buddy on your first working day. You can always reach out to your Buddy and you will have regular meetings.

data.title: Bild

webparts.innerHtml: Your first day

On your first day we would like to give you a warm welcome in person with a dedicated Onboarding Session. It will be a chance to make your integration into our organization easier thanks to an onboarding path guided by Human Resources, your Manager and your Buddy. During the event, you will have the opportunity to get to know your colleagues, deepen your understanding of our company values and the most important administrative/organizational topics.

On your first day at Nexi you will:

  • participate in the local Onboarding Session
  • get your identification badge 
  • receive your equipment (laptop, backpack, headphones) 
  • meet your Manager and your Buddy who will introduce you to your new colleagues and accompany you to your office

More about the Onboarding Session…

In most locations we have on the first working day of a month our Country Onboarding Sessions. These sessions take place in person in the main office of the countries and you will learn more about our Organization, our HR practices and everything which is important for your start at Nexi Group. You have also the opportunity to meet the other new colleagues who started at the same time.

If there are just a few New Joiners in your location, you will have an individual session with your Buddy and/or HR.

What will happen during the session:

  • Welcome & Getting to know you​
  • Nexi Group - Business Presentation​
  • Our values and HR practices ​
  • Local information and company tools

webparts.innerHtml: During your first week

You will get to know your new colleagues, other teams, customers, company rules and regulations.
You will follow your individual Onboarding Plan and also conduct our mandatory trainings on regulatory topics (e.g. Health & Safety, GDPR, Antitrust, Market Abuse, Business Continuity...).

We have created a dedicated Intranet Page for our New Joiners called “New2Nexi” to get familiar with our company guidelines, country specific information and other little helpers.
Find out more about your location: Your Homespot
Onboarding ABC

To help you prepare for your time at Nexi, we've put together some answers to typical FAQs from our New Joiners! If you have any further questions, please always feel free to reach out to your Manager, Buddy or Recruiter!

A

All staff meetings

In nearly all countries we have monthly all staff meetings, where the country manager informs all employees about what is happening and what are the priorities for the next time.

B

Buddy

The Buddy is your go-to person for every belonging - learn more here. 

Business Units

We operate in 4 Business Units: 
Merchant Solutions (MS), eCom, Issuing Solutions (IS) and Digital Banking Solutions (DBS). Read more here.

C

Customers

The daily activities, new products, innovation and investments of the Group are always calibrated by putting the customer at the centre - We are driving excellence for our customers, always.

We have two types of customers - on the one hand Merchants (from small restaurants to large retail companies) and on the other hand Banks (supply, issue and manage private and corporate cards and also clearing and digital banking).

D

Dialogs

You will have regular dialogs with your Manager about mutual expectations, progress on the Introduction plan, Priorities, Reflection and Development.  

Directions

Find all office addresses and directions under the specific locations.

Diversity

For Nexi Group, it is essential to create a dynamic, diverse, and inclusive workplace, where everyone feels welcome and can disclose their full potential. The main driver is to continue the development towards ensuring a forward-looking Group, that can attract and develop talent regardless of nationality, ethnicity, gender, sexual orientation, religion, or belief.

 

Dresscode

Business casual - come as you are but use your best judgement 😉

E

European by scale, local by nature 

We use the size of the company to utilize the entire power, but we remain local where necessary, above all to be close to our customers and follow local requirements.

ESG

Nexi Group has developed its ESG Strategy which is one of the pillars of the Business Plan. The strategy is based on six pillars, including various goals, such as our commitment to decarbonisation, further strengthening and promoting diversity, equity, and inclusion to be achieved through specific initiatives, and developing employee networks and communities.

F

First day

On your first day there is usually an Onboarding Session or it is planned by your Manager and Buddy. Find more information in the section Your Homespot. 

First name

You are on the safe side when you call everyone by the first name from first day on. 😊

G

Geography

Nexi Group has more than 60 offices spread across Europe.

We operate in different regions: 
Italy, DACH, CSEE (Central and southeaster Europe) and Nordics.

 

H

HQ

The Headquarter of the Nexi Group is in Milan, Italy.

L

local by nature, European by scale 

We use the size of the company to … but we remain still local where needed, especially near to our customers.

Location

You are interested how you new office looks like? Have a look at your location in the section: Your Homespot. 

M

myHR

We are implementing myHR in whole Nexi Group. This is an oracle-based tool that we use as our HR system - for Recruitment, Employee Self Service, HR Support, internal Job board, Performance Management, HR Ticket system and much more. You have already used it in your Recruitment process. 😉

 

N

Nexi

Nexi stands for next generation payment but also next to our customers.  With Nexi we connect Next - Innovation - Future.

 

Nexchange 

Nexchange is our New Nexi International Development program where colleagues can go on a 3-6 months assignment in a different part of the group.

O

O365 / Collaboration Platforms 

In Nexi Group we use Sharepoint to share our files - we use MS Office, Teams and much more. As HR tool we are implementing myHR (Oracle)…

Office environment

Learn more about your immediate office environment in the section Your Your Homespot.

Onboarding Plan

You all will receive an individual Onboarding Plan from your Manager which will help you settling in your new role.

Onboarding Sessions

In nearly every country we have Onboarding Sessions to help you understanding our organization and culture - read more here.

Open Questions

If you have any question, please reach out to your Manager, Buddy or Recruiter - we are all here for you!

P

PayTech University

The PayTech University is a Nexi designed unique touchpoint for all the training initiatives and learning opportunities inside the Group. You will have access from day 1 on and use it also for all mandatory trainings. 

There will be also a New Joiner Path as part of the PayTech University, special designed for you as a new employee to follow. 

Purpose

We drive progress by simplifying transactions and by empowering people and businesses to enjoy closer relationships and prosper together.

T​​​​​​​

Travel expenses

Once you are here, you can reimburse your travel expenses through your local tool.

V

Values

Building on our Cultural Foundations, our Values and Behaviours will help us to come together as One Nexi and create future fundament for how we act and work together and what we aspire to be as a company. Watch this video to find out more:

data.title: Shared Page

webparts.innerHtml:
W

Wiktionary

If you come from a different industry, you might hear a lot of special expressions that we use. To get you started, we've written down the most important expressions for you in our Wiktionary.

WIN

Women In Nexi. We want to create an environment where female talents are empowered to fulfill their potential and have equal opportunities to male talents.

Y

You are in the driver seat!

We love you being proactive and share your thoughts with us!
